ai_channel_count.definition: The number of input channels of the DAQ-device.

ai_channel_gain.definition: The gain of an input channel.

ai_polarity.definition: The polarity of the measurement "unipolar" or "bipolar".

ai_reference.definition: The reference to which voltages were measured. Usually either "common ground" or "differential".

ai_resolution.definition: The voltage resolution of the analog input (AIN) subsystem given in bit.

ai_sample_rate.definition:
The sample rate with which an individual input
            channel was sampled. Given in Hz.

ai_used_channel_count.definition: The number of used analog input channels.

ao_channel_count.definition: The number of output channels of the device.

ao_channel_gain.definition: The gain of an output channel.

ao_resolution.definition:
The voltage resolution of a data-acquisition
             analog output (AO) subsystem given in bit.

ao_sample_rate.definition:
The sample rate with which an individual output
            channel was sampled. Given in Hz.

ao_used_channel_count.definition: The number of used analog output channels.

definition: The hardware section describes the settings of the used hardware. There should be one hardware section for each hardware item that was used.

description.definition: A description of this hardware item.

dio_line_count.definition: The number of digital input/output lines (DIO) of the device.

inventory_no.definition: The inventory number of the device.

manufacturer.definition: The Manufacturer of this hardware item.

model.definition: The model name of this hardware item.

owner.definition: Who's the owner of the device.
